description:
Newly renovated apartment with a comfy full sized bed available on 128th St in West Harlem! The unit is fully furnished with a full sized bed and a sofa bed, table, chairs, cableTV, wifi and has a full fridge, stove, and microwave!

This amazing apartment can hold up to 4 people.

The unit has high ceilings, a completed renovation throughout, beautiful flood lighting and exposed brick!

Best part, total seclusion. You share with no one! The entire unit is yours during your stay. 

It's a fully furnished apartment that can hold up to 4 people

The entire unit is yours to explore. We provide toiletries and essentials as well as WiFi, Internet, Basic Cable, Coffee, Tea, Hot Chocolate, Water.

My assistant may be there to check you in depending on your check in method, but aside from that you will be alone for your stay.

The neighborhood of central Harlem is very diverse and full of culture! We are a few blocks from Historic 125th Street, The Apollo Theatre, The Schomburg museum, Sylvia's Restaurant, and many other attractions

The 2,3 trains are a few blocks away for an easy commute anywhere in the city! 15 minutes to midtown!!!! 

The ABCD on St. Nicholas Ave and  4,5,6 trains on Lexington Ave are about 9 minutes  by walking.

This is a prime location for transit! Everything is right there!!!!
name: Hamilton Gardens
review: Place was nice and clean, solid location close to trains and food. Backyard is beautiful!
